title: The Bassumtyte Treasure
description: Tommy Bassumtyte 10, sent to England, finds cousin Thomas not as expected. Boxleton House, built by an ancestor over 400 years ago, has changed little. Fallen upon hard times, cold, damp, gardens neglected, but a secret room reminds them of Grandpa's rhyme about treasure. Mary Queen of Scots, ghosts, mazes, midnight rides, time slips, embroidered tapestries ...
author: Jane Louise Curry
